title: Create dairy products e-commerce web application

requirements.text: Create a product catalog displaying dairy items including milk, curd, eggs, and other dairy products with product images, names, descriptions, and prices
acceptanceCriteria: Product catalog displays at least milk, curd, and eggs as separate items
Each product shows an image, name, description, and price
Products are stored in the backend and retrieved by the frontend
Catalog is visually organized and easy to browse

requirements.text: Implement shopping cart functionality allowing users to add dairy products, adjust quantities, and view their cart total
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add products to cart from the catalog
Users can increase or decrease quantities in the cart
Users can remove items from the cart
Cart displays running total of all items
Cart state persists during the session

requirements.text: Create a checkout process where users can review their order and complete the purchase
acceptanceCriteria: Checkout page displays order summary with all items and total
Users can enter delivery information (name, address, contact)
Order is saved to the backend upon completion
Users receive confirmation after successful checkout

requirements.text: Design the application to be fully mobile-responsive with an optimized layout for phone screens
acceptanceCriteria: All pages render correctly on mobile screen sizes
Touch-friendly buttons and interactions
Product grid adapts to single column on small screens
Navigation is accessible and usable on mobile devices

requirements.text: Apply a fresh, farm-inspired visual theme with warm, natural colors (greens, whites, earth tones), clean typography, and a welcoming layout that evokes trust and freshness appropriate for a dairy marketplace
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses natural, farm-inspired tones (avoid blue and purple)
Typography is clean and readable
Overall design conveys freshness and trustworthiness
Visual theme is applied consistently across all pages
